title: Jorge
overview: Jorge is a frustrated lawyer who works in a call center. His girlfriend Luciana leaves him the same day his father dies. In the midst of his depression, he learns that his father left him a huge house as an inheritance. Since he cannot keep the house alone, he decides to rent two rooms. Its tenants will be Ludovico, a lively and enterprising boy, who is paralyzed, and Julio Cesar, a Paraguayan Literature student.
